Olya Kvachan

Stylist

Meet Olya.

Born and raised in Ukraine, she brings an international flair to both her work and the salon as a whole! Graduated from TONI&GUY she is passionate and driven to create perfection on everything she touches. Olya utilizes organic shapes and custom services to ensure every head is its own unique masterpiece. Book with Olya for natural looking, beautiful hair, and a custom look that is made just for you. Her stunning work will be your newest guilty pleasure.
